mapper.select: SELECT ans.goods_id,question_contents,question_date,answer_date ,answer_contents, count(good.user_id) as total FROM questions as que join answers as ans on que.question_id= ans.question_id left join qa_like as good on good.answer_id= ans.answer_id where que.goods_id = #{goodsId} group by good.answer_id order by count(good.user_id) DESC ,answer_date DESC order by ${orderBy} DESC limit #{page},#{number}
SELECT count(*) as totalCount FROM questions as que join answers as ans on que.question_id= ans.question_id where que.goods_id = #{goodsId} and proved=0
